comments.author: Matt
comments.body: Where's the cutesy graphic? We can't ride without a cutesy graphic on the blog!

comments.author: Greg
comments.body: Looks like Jared on 1/2 a Subway sub a day. -Pokey

comments.author: Dennis
comments.body: Looks like me in 1982 'cept I had 32 spoke wheels. DMM

comments.author: Matt
comments.body: Am I the only one in this group that has any sort of survival instinct? Yes, when the wind nearly blew me over (_when I was stopped_) I decided that catching a ride, if possible, would be the most prudent thing to do. It's crazy that the single, care-free guy of the group is telling the marrieds to play it safe(r).

comments.author: Dave
comments.body: Guess I didn't notice... Was it windy?
